REMINDER: K-11 Curriculum & Tech Drop-Off begins TOMORROW, Thursday, May 28th.

Preparation for Tech Drop Off:
1. Plug the iPad in and be sure it is on the Wi-Fi so that we can wipe it remotely to remove all of your student’s data (you can do this anytime between Tuesday, 5/26 and Thursday, 5/28. We will push the commands remotely but the device needs to be plugged in and online to receive the commands. You will know when the process is complete and you can move on to step 2 when the initial “Hello” screen comes up. If that never happens, there may be a connection issue, please just move on to step 2 and return the device at your scheduled time. We will take care of it at that time.
2. Take the iPad out of the case.
3. Completely sanitize all of the case and the iPad.
4. Place iPad in a Ziploc bag and write your student’s name on the iPad.
5. Place charging cable and block in a sandwich or quart-size Ziploc bag and write your student’s name on the bag.

*Please refer to Mrs. Painter's email for K-5 curriculum return list.

Furthermore, we know that it is nearly impossible for us to find a school like Bradford Prep in Kansas or anywhere else. Bradford has provided me with so many things possible for my family, me, and for the orchestra, so many doors were open, and I am leaving with beautiful and joyful memories, and with my heart full of gratefulness for such a wonderful time."
Thank you very much!
The Rosario family will miss you!!

Please know that if you need anything both the teachers and the administrators are here for you. Your efforts have not gone unnoticed.

With a grateful heart, A Bradford Prep Teacher

The first House day using the new Gym is in the books! Great job to the PE staff for organizing the Amazing Race event! So wonderful to see students working together.. and seeing their reactions when they ran into the gym for the first time! Truly an amazing day. Students were saying how awesome the gym is all day, amazed at the size and in awe that it is THEIRS! We cannot thank the supporters of the Give.Grow.Together campaign enough! Thanks to you, these students have amazing bleachers, beautiful locker rooms, awesome performing art space and more. At the end of the day a 7th grade student came up to me and said "We are so lucky to go to school here, Bradford is the BEST!"
We absolutely agree! THANK YOU TO ALL OF OUR SUPPORTERS! #gobears #Bpbears
